flannel.translation[0].definitions[0].de: soft cloth, usually made of cotton or wool, used for making clothes
flannel.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a piece of cloth you use to wash yourself
flannel.translation[0].definitions[2].de: something that someone says that has no real meaning or does not tell you what you want to know
flannel.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to say things that have no real meaning in order to avoid answering a question directly or to hide your lack of knowledge
